label: cascading_failure_01_dx_storage_capacity_017
content:
## 2026-01-18 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /storage/cluster/usage: REQUESTS 1,200,000 req | p50: 12ms p95: 45ms p99: 78ms | err: 0.2% (2,400 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/node/utilization: REQUESTS 950,000 req | p50: 8ms p95: 30ms p99: 55ms | err: 0.1% (950 errors) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/rebalance/status: REQUESTS 150,000 req | p50: 20ms p95: 60ms p99: 90ms | err: 0.3% (450 errors) | success: 99.7%
- /storage/compaction/run: REQUESTS 300,000 req | p50: 15ms p95: 50ms p99: 85ms | err: 0.2% (600 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/io/metrics: REQUESTS 500,000 req | p50: 10ms p95: 40ms p99: 70ms | err: 0.1% (500 errors) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/metadata/db: REQUESTS 400,000 req | p50: 9ms p95: 35ms p99: 65ms | err: 0.1% (400 errors) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/quota/enforce: REQUESTS 100,000 req | p50: 7ms p95: 25ms p99: 45ms | err: 0.2% (200 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/ingest: REQUESTS 250,000 req | p50: 11ms p95: 42ms p99: 75ms | err: 0.2% (500 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/backup/verify: REQUESTS 50,000 req | p50: 38ms p95: 60ms p99: 85ms | err: 0.0% (0 errors) | success: 100%
- /storage/reliability/status: REQUESTS 80,000 req | p50: 10ms p95: 30ms p99: 55ms | err: 0.0% (0 errors) | success: 100%

### Infrastructure
- stor-a-11: CPU 87% | Mem 86% | Disk Used 98% | Conns: 1200 | Net: 9.8/8.6 Gbps
- stor-b-08: CPU 69% | Mem 76% | Disk Used 96% | Conns: 950 | Net: 7.2/6.6 Gbps
- stor-c-04: CPU 62% | Mem 72% | Disk Used 93% | Conns: 800 | Net: 6.2/5.6 Gbps
- meta-01: CPU 71% | Mem 92% | Disk Used 86% | Conns: 600 | Net: 3.8/3.2 Gbps

### Connection Pools
- storage-rebalance: active 11 | idle 4 | waiting 3 | exhaustion 0 | max 20 | avg_wait 15ms
- storage-compaction: active 9 | idle 2 | waiting 1 | exhaustion 0 | max 15 | avg_wait 12ms
- storage-io: active 12 | idle 3 | waiting 2 | exhaustion 0 | max 20 | avg_wait 10ms
- storage-metadata: active 10 | idle 5 | waiting 2 | exhaustion 0 | max 15 | avg_wait 8ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 88.2% | Bandwidth: 4.2 Gbps | Origin requests: 120,000

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] scrub_errors on stor-a-11: 35
- [WARNING] metadata backlog backlog: 4700
- [WARNING] quota_hard_blocks: 4
- [WARNING] network_drops: 24

### Deployments & Changes
- Weekly restore drill executed on metadata + 1 TB data sample; RTO 50 minutes, checksum validation passed.
- Added extra metadata worker and enabled batching for namespace operations.
- Increased scrub concurrency for affected placement groups.
- Elevated metadata QPS with manifest backlog growth.
- Enforced archival policy and migrated cold datasets to EC pool.

### Events
- Weekly restore drill executed on metadata + 1 TB data sample; RTO 50 minutes, checksum validation passed.
- Scrub errors spiked to 35 during high tombstone churn; increased scrub concurrency only for affected placement groups and scheduled compaction priority.
- Manifest backlog grew to 4.7k with elevated metadata QPS; added an extra metadata worker and enabled batching for namespace operations.
- Quota hard blocks increased to 4 with large ingest; on-call coordinated archival policy enforcement and temporary EC pool migration for cold datasets.

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: Victor S. 7 pages. 13 tickets. Status: Degraded; metadata backlog and scrub/compaction pressure under heavy ingest. Restore drill successful; mitigation focused on batching, targeted scrubs, and tenant data lifecycle actions.
